properties.name: id
properties.doc: Holds the identifier of the tagged entity

properties.name: name
properties.doc: Holds the name of the tagged entity

properties.name: text
properties.doc: Holds text that is used to tag something

properties.name: x
properties.doc:
Holds the x position of the tagged entity or text in the photo.
This coordinate is a percentage from the left edge of the photo.

properties.name: y
properties.doc:
Holds the y position of the tagged entity or text in the photo.
This coordinate is a percentage from the top edge of the photo.

properties.name: created_time
properties.doc: Holds the creation time of the tag in an ISO8601-formatted string.
